037package org.jfree.chart.block;
038
039import java.awt.Color;
040import java.awt.Font;
041import java.awt.Graphics2D;
042import java.awt.Paint;
043import java.awt.Shape;
044import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
045import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
046import java.io.IOException;
047import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
048import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
049import java.util.Objects;
050
051import org.jfree.chart.entity.ChartEntity;
052import org.jfree.chart.entity.StandardEntityCollection;
053import org.jfree.chart.text.TextBlock;
054import org.jfree.chart.text.TextBlockAnchor;
055import org.jfree.chart.text.TextUtils;
056import org.jfree.chart.api.RectangleAnchor;
057import org.jfree.chart.internal.PaintUtils;
058import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
059import org.jfree.chart.api.PublicCloneable;
060import org.jfree.chart.internal.SerialUtils;
061
062/**
063 * A block containing a label.
064 */
065public class LabelBlock extends AbstractBlock
066        implements Block, PublicCloneable {
067
068    /** For serialization. */
069    static final long serialVersionUID = 249626098864178017L;
070
071    /**
072     * The text for the label - retained in case the label needs
073     * regenerating (for example, to change the font).
074     */
075    private final String text;
076
077    /** The label. */
078    private TextBlock label;
079
080    /** The font. */
081    private Font font;
082
083    /** The tool tip text (can be {@code null}). */
084    private String toolTipText;
085
086    /** The URL text (can be {@code null}). */
087    private String urlText;
088
089    /** The default color. */
090    public static final Paint DEFAULT_PAINT = Color.BLACK;
091
092    /** The paint. */
093    private transient Paint paint;
094
095    /**
096     * The content alignment point.
097     */
098    private TextBlockAnchor contentAlignmentPoint;
099
100    /**
101     * The anchor point for the text.
102     */
103    private RectangleAnchor textAnchor;
104
105    /**
106     * Creates a new label block.
107     *
108     * @param label  the label ({@code null} not permitted).
109     */
110    public LabelBlock(String label) {
111        this(label, new Font("SansSerif", Font.PLAIN, 10), DEFAULT_PAINT);
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Creates a new label block.
116     *
117     * @param text  the text for the label ({@code null} not permitted).
118     * @param font  the font ({@code null} not permitted).
119     */
120    public LabelBlock(String text, Font font) {
121        this(text, font, DEFAULT_PAINT);
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Creates a new label block.
126     *
127     * @param text  the text for the label ({@code null} not permitted).
128     * @param font  the font ({@code null} not permitted).
129     * @param paint the paint ({@code null} not permitted).
130     */
131    public LabelBlock(String text, Font font, Paint paint) {
132        this.text = text;
133        this.paint = paint;
134        this.label = TextUtils.createTextBlock(text, font, this.paint);
135        this.font = font;
136        this.toolTipText = null;
137        this.urlText = null;
138        this.contentAlignmentPoint = TextBlockAnchor.CENTER;
139        this.textAnchor = RectangleAnchor.CENTER;
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Returns the font.
144     *
145     * @return The font (never {@code null}).
146     *
147     * @see #setFont(Font)
148     */
149    public Font getFont() {
150        return this.font;
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * Sets the font and regenerates the label.
155     *
156     * @param font  the font ({@code null} not permitted).
157     *
158     * @see #getFont()
159     */
160    public void setFont(Font font) {
161        Args.nullNotPermitted(font, "font");
162        this.font = font;
163        this.label = TextUtils.createTextBlock(this.text, font, this.paint);
164    }
165
166    /**
167     * Returns the paint.
168     *
169     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
170     *
171     * @see #setPaint(Paint)
172     */
173    public Paint getPaint() {
174        return this.paint;
175    }
176
177    /**
178     * Sets the paint and regenerates the label.
179     *
180     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} not permitted).
181     *
182     * @see #getPaint()
183     */
184    public void setPaint(Paint paint) {
185        Args.nullNotPermitted(paint, "paint");
186        this.paint = paint;
187        this.label = TextUtils.createTextBlock(this.text, this.font,
188                this.paint);
189    }
190
191    /**
192     * Returns the tool tip text.
193     *
194     * @return The tool tip text (possibly {@code null}).
195     *
196     * @see #setToolTipText(String)
197     */
198    public String getToolTipText() {
199        return this.toolTipText;
200    }
201
202    /**
203     * Sets the tool tip text.
204     *
205     * @param text  the text ({@code null} permitted).
206     *
207     * @see #getToolTipText()
208     */
209    public void setToolTipText(String text) {
210        this.toolTipText = text;
211    }
212
213    /**
214     * Returns the URL text.
215     *
216     * @return The URL text (possibly {@code null}).
217     *
218     * @see #setURLText(String)
219     */
220    public String getURLText() {
221        return this.urlText;
222    }
223
224    /**
225     * Sets the URL text.
226     *
227     * @param text  the text ({@code null} permitted).
228     *
229     * @see #getURLText()
230     */
231    public void setURLText(String text) {
232        this.urlText = text;
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * Returns the content alignment point.
237     *
238     * @return The content alignment point (never {@code null}).
239     */
240    public TextBlockAnchor getContentAlignmentPoint() {
241        return this.contentAlignmentPoint;
242    }
243
244    /**
245     * Sets the content alignment point.
246     *
247     * @param anchor  the anchor used to determine the alignment point (never
248     *         {@code null}).
249     */
250    public void setContentAlignmentPoint(TextBlockAnchor anchor) {
251        Args.nullNotPermitted(anchor, "anchor");
252        this.contentAlignmentPoint = anchor;
253    }
254
255    /**
256     * Returns the text anchor (never {@code null}).
257     *
258     * @return The text anchor.
259     */
260    public RectangleAnchor getTextAnchor() {
261        return this.textAnchor;
262    }
263
264    /**
265     * Sets the text anchor.
266     *
267     * @param anchor  the anchor ({@code null} not permitted).
268     */
269    public void setTextAnchor(RectangleAnchor anchor) {
270        this.textAnchor = anchor;
271    }
272
273    /**
274     * Arranges the contents of the block, within the given constraints, and
275     * returns the block size.
276     *
277     * @param g2  the graphics device.
278     * @param constraint  the constraint ({@code null} not permitted).
279     *
280     * @return The block size (in Java2D units, never {@code null}).
281     */
282    @Override
283    public Size2D arrange(Graphics2D g2, RectangleConstraint constraint) {
284        g2.setFont(this.font);
285        Size2D s = this.label.calculateDimensions(g2);
286        return new Size2D(calculateTotalWidth(s.getWidth()),
287                calculateTotalHeight(s.getHeight()));
288    }
289
290    /**
291     * Draws the block.
292     *
293     * @param g2  the graphics device.
294     * @param area  the area.
295     */
296    @Override
297    public void draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area) {
298        draw(g2, area, null);
299    }
300
301    /**
302     * Draws the block within the specified area.
303     *
304     * @param g2  the graphics device.
305     * @param area  the area.
306     * @param params  ignored ({@code null} permitted).
307     *
308     * @return Always {@code null}.
309     */
310    @Override
311    public Object draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area, Object params) {
312        area = trimMargin(area);
313        drawBorder(g2, area);
314        area = trimBorder(area);
315        area = trimPadding(area);
316
317        // check if we need to collect chart entities from the container
318        EntityBlockParams ebp = null;
319        StandardEntityCollection sec = null;
320        Shape entityArea = null;
321        if (params instanceof EntityBlockParams) {
322            ebp = (EntityBlockParams) params;
323            if (ebp.getGenerateEntities()) {
324                sec = new StandardEntityCollection();
325                entityArea = (Shape) area.clone();
326            }
327        }
328        g2.setPaint(this.paint);
329        g2.setFont(this.font);
330        Point2D pt = this.textAnchor.getAnchorPoint(area);
331        this.label.draw(g2, (float) pt.getX(), (float) pt.getY(),
332                this.contentAlignmentPoint);
333        BlockResult result = null;
334        if (ebp != null && sec != null) {
335            if (this.toolTipText != null || this.urlText != null) {
336                ChartEntity entity = new ChartEntity(entityArea,
337                        this.toolTipText, this.urlText);
338                sec.add(entity);
339                result = new BlockResult();
340                result.setEntityCollection(sec);
341            }
342        }
343        return result;
344    }
345
346    /**
347     * Tests this {@code LabelBlock} for equality with an arbitrary object.
348     *
349     * @param obj  the object ({@code null} permitted).
350     *
351     * @return A boolean.
352     */
353    @Override
354    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
355        if (!(obj instanceof LabelBlock)) {
356            return false;
357        }
358        LabelBlock that = (LabelBlock) obj;
359        if (!this.text.equals(that.text)) {
360            return false;
361        }
362        if (!this.font.equals(that.font)) {
363            return false;
364        }
365        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.paint, that.paint)) {
366            return false;
367        }
368        if (!Objects.equals(this.toolTipText, that.toolTipText)) {
369            return false;
370        }
371        if (!Objects.equals(this.urlText, that.urlText)) {
372            return false;
373        }
374        if (!this.contentAlignmentPoint.equals(that.contentAlignmentPoint)) {
375            return false;
376        }
377        if (!this.textAnchor.equals(that.textAnchor)) {
378            return false;
379        }
380        return super.equals(obj);
381    }
382
383    /**
384     * Returns a clone of this {@code LabelBlock} instance.
385     *
386     * @return A clone.
387     *
388     * @throws CloneNotSupportedException if there is a problem cloning.
389     */
390    @Override
391    public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
392        return super.clone();
393    }
394
395    /**
396     * Provides serialization support.
397     *
398     * @param stream  the output stream.
399     *
400     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O error.
401     */
402    private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
403        stream.defaultWriteObject();
404        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.paint, stream);
405    }
406
407    /**
408     * Provides serialization support.
409     *
410     * @param stream  the input stream.
411     *
412     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
413     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a classpath problem.
414     */
415    private void readObject(ObjectInputStream stream)
416        throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
417        stream.defaultReadObject();
418        this.paint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
419    }
420
421}
